headline: Comcast Business Expands Enterprise Capabilities With Acquisition of U.S. Managed Services Provider Nitel
summary: PHILADELPHIA, December 11, 2024--Comcast Business today announced it has signed an agreement to acquire Nitel, a U.S. managed services provider headquartered in Chicago, from international private equity firm Cinven. The acquisition will expand Comcast Business’ presence in connectivity, global secure networking and advanced technology, and enhance Comcast’s ability to serve enterprise clients.
